statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 0 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -9 \\ 6 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ -13 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -19 \\ 4 \\ -8 \\ 10 \\ -22 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
